title: Ep 130: You've Got a Friend With Aminatou Sow and Ann Friedman
itunes:title: Ep 130: You've Got a Friend With Aminatou Sow and Ann Friedman
itunes:subtitle: Kate has a big cry and deals with dehydration, and Doree binges some reality tv. Then Aminatou Sow and Ann Friedman (hosts of Call Your Girlfriend and authors of Big Friendship) join them to talk growing and maintaining big friendships, what it really ...
description:
Kate has a big cry and deals with dehydration, and Doree binges some reality tv. Then Aminatou Sow and Ann Friedman (hosts of Call Your Girlfriend and authors of Big Friendship) join them to talk growing and maintaining big friendships, what it really means when a friendship is “toxic”, and how their own friendship has evolved and strengthened over time.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. For info on Forever35 Office Hours, click here.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

MOLEKULE - For 10% off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter FOREVER10 at checkout.

ATHENA CLUB - Athena Club is a better self-care routine made simple. Just go to AthenaClub.com and use promo code FOREVER35 for 15% off today! 


Theme music by Riot.
